Headline: #75 74th-75thTemporary Westbound Reroute near 75th/South Shore
ShortDescription: Westbound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony Island, 76th, South Chicago and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony Island, 76th, South Chicago and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Shore.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red and Purple Line Trains bypassing Berwyn
ShortDescription: Red and Purple Line trains are running, but not stopping at Berwyn due to a medical emergency on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red and Purple Line trains are running, but not stopping at Berwyn due to a medical emergency on the tracks.

95th bound trains will bypass Bryn Mawr, Berwyn, Argyle and Lawrence.

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service between Howard and Belmont in both directions.

At this time also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#36 Broadway

#151 Sheridan

#84 Peterson

#92 Foster

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Berwyn/Broadway
ShortDescription: Eastbound #92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Broadway, Bryn Mawr, Sheridan, due to street blockage near Berwyn/Broadway.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Broadway, Bryn Mawr, Sheridan, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Berwyn/Broadway.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: # 146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Berwyn/Broadway

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound # 146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, Foster, Broadway,  Bryn Mawr, Sheridan, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Berwyn/Broadway.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
